(Simplified: 诮)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 肖 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 肖 [ xiào ] to resemble, to look like; to be like
①責備：誚讓。譏誚。誚呵。
(Simplified: 诮)

Pictophonetic: 肖 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
Hanzi: 诮

Related Character(s): 譙
Связанный символ (и): 譙

Original meaning 本义: Meaning criticize, scold, blame, ridicule

誚字的基本解释

誚
qiào
见“诮”。

誚字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qiào］
［《廣韻》才笑切，去笑，從。］
“诮1”的繁体字。
(1)责备。
(2)嘲笑，讥刺。
(3)副词。简直；完全。
(4)通“譙”。参见“誚厚”。
(5)通“悄”。忧。参见“誚惱”。

誚字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誚； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1163第03
【說文】古文譙字。【書·金滕】王亦未敢誚公。【傳】讓也。【前漢·黥布傳】項王數使使者誚讓召布。【註】誚責也。

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qiào］
["Guangyun" only laughed and cut, laughed, and followed. ]
Traditional characters for "诮1".
(1) Blame.
(2) Laugh and ridicule.
(3) Adverbs. Simply; completely.
(4) Through "Qiao". See "Zhou Hou".
(5) Through "quiet". worry. See "annoying".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　诮; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1163 No. 03
【Speaking】Ancient prose to defy words. 【Book·Jin Teng】Wang did not dare to criticize his father. [Biography] Let also. [Previous Han·Tingbu Biography] Xiang Wangshu's messenger blamed Rang Zhaobu. [Note] blame also.
